documents.document: @MJRgrs It’ll be like your instagram then?
@liamwaterloo Me too. And I have to go to the opposite side of London. THE FEAR.
@Seyinoir I met Mel C once at a friend’s birthday party. She was so normal and lovely and down to earth I loved her. I sat next to her on a sofa and chatted for hours with her and her partner.
I have to travel to angel in an hour. From Putney. First world problems.
Happy new year etc to you all for later.
@DorkyUdon I love your book choices. I think I’ve read almost all of those 🎉

LA Noire on the Switch is soooo good!
@cityboyben We were at my sisters in Oxford and then at mine from Boxing Day. It’s lovely. Hand made by welsh woolsmiths.
@cityboyben Excellent! Mine seemed to last forever. Parents just left. I got a lovely throw. https://t.co/OfOxYaCV6r
RT @evertonmatt1878: Boys don't dress as princesses https://t.co/RWDncYjv2T
This was my best Christmas present #pamplemousse #rose https://t.co/gYGqdvCt2U
@hxrald I wear mine in a chelsea knot tucked into my zipped hoodie
I’m awake and showered and dressed and in the sitting room next to the tree and EVERYONE else is still in bed 😬😬😬
Dear twitter I just watched the last Jedi at the cinema and I loved it the end.
@vxldano_ Get a new one before you’re trapped in Brexit hell!
@rob_ev Someone at work gave it to me. I think it’s from China.
@VitorForte @Jestemryan I don’t know why people are so needlessly horrible. It’s a sign of massive deep-seated insecurity isn’t it?
@PatchMcScratchy I was flirted at once by a cheeky girl. It was possibly the weirdest experience I’ve ever had.
Omg look at this pen https://t.co/6CLrxt0E7q

@foxhandybread This year going to Oxford to my sister and her husbands house. Parents are over from France. And Tom & sophie going as well. It will be ‘cosy’ (ie, I will be sleeping under the tree with the cat)
@foxhandybread Where are you for Xmas? Op north?
I would have been around 15 then. Maybe 16. After I had my curtains chopped.
This is foetus me at Christmas. Date unknown. https://t.co/80yrCw17YV
@Asshhyyyy Im following you on insta now 👥
@charlzton I was on the tube and someone stank of piss ffs 🤮
@cwjs0 *annoyingly optimistic face* You’ve shed and discarded old baggage and ready to start anew! Tomorrow you’ll feel fresh and invigorated to begin a new chapter! 😁
@den_zooo That is the WORST. some people are animals.
@Rhammified Ahhh. Ok. Thanks. It confused me.

I’VE GROWN TIRED OF BEING LIED TO ALEXA https://t.co/BlrEzsbNeM
@wesbxrland No need to boast... some of us are ugly you know ☹️
Ugh I’ve got Linda McCartney burps 🤢
RT @honorcamper: Welcome, weary traveler, to my SHOP. How may I assist you? > BUY > SELL https://t.co/gRG10G2NQ3
@goldblumr Oh god I remember your she wolf obsession.
@Craig_Owen1 I may trim it before next week!
I’ve an irrational hatred of referring to someone as ‘this one’. Where does it originate?
@tbywilsn I don’t even want to ask 🤔
@SupaThunderCunt Ahhh. I’m just entering winter of year 2. A witch pissed on my henhouse and a meteor crashed into the farmland!
@Seyinoir Haha. Say British people don’t understand the whole tipping thing and you may need a guiding hand 😂
@Seyinoir 😏 how were you thinking of tipping him?
@Seyinoir Isn’t your landlord hot and gay?
